definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to express sympathy, greetings, consolation etc
to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
to give one's respects/to send a greeting/(fig.) (coll.) to make offensive reference to (somebody dear to the person to whom one is speaking)
to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
to have sth go wrong/to have a problem arise/to give problems

sentences.english: He is a physically active, super—curious and highly inquisitive boy.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位体力活跃，非常好奇以及很好问的男孩。

sentences.english: I asked my colleague you in that school? He said that in.
sentences.chinese: 我问我同事你在那上学呢？他说在，电大。

sentences.english: We ask the young Uighur restaurant worker how it should be stopped.
sentences.chinese: 我们问餐厅年轻的维吾尔员工这样冤冤相报何时能了。

sentences.english: I asked the strange boy, raising my eyebrows in curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 我好奇地扬起眉毛问这个奇怪的年轻人。
哈蒙德夫人问，“为什么谢我？”

sentences.english: Alternatively, you may ask the Clerk for an Execution form?
sentences.chinese: 或者，你可以问书记官要一份执行表格。

sentences.english: Many data warehousing managers ask these questions today.
sentences.chinese: 今天又很多数据仓库项目经理都在问以上的问题。

sentences.english: Sara is asking Yang Pei about her future plans.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉正在问杨佩关于未来的打算。

sentences.english: But users also ask about current events and many other subjects.
sentences.chinese: 但是用户也会问及时事和许多其他的问题。

sentences.english: After making his tea, I asked if it would be all right if I visited him again .
sentences.chinese: 给他泡好茶之后，我问他以后是否可以再来拜访。

sentences.english: But the way , have you seen Mr Zang . our manager ?
sentences.chinese: 顺便问一声，你见到我们的张经理吗？

sentences.english: The man took it and asked what he had to pay his shave.
sentences.chinese: 卖扫帚的人拿回了扫帚，随后问修面要付多少钱。

sentences.english: Andrew. Let me ask you this question, Andrew.
sentences.chinese: 我来问你一个问题，安德鲁。

sentences.english: Admiral Murphy reasonably inquired into our location.
sentences.chinese: 航队司令莫费当然要问我们的位置。

sentences.english: Just as I was busiest, he must come bothering me with some questions.
sentences.chinese: 正在我最忙的时候，偏巧他来问我一些问题来烦我。

definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
to question/to ask/to raise a question
to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]
variant of 怎麼了|怎么了[zen3 me5 le5]
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
